DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety immunogenicity third vaccination one three different concentration TBE vaccine volunteer complete two vaccination one three treatment group Baxter study 205 ( safety immunogenicity two vaccination FSME IMMUN NEW healthy volunteer age 6 16 year ) .
DOC.brief_title: FSME IMMUN NEW Follow-up Study 205 Children Aged 6 16 Years
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : All volunteer participate Baxter study 205 receive two vaccination invited participate . Male female child eligible participation study : They receive two vaccination one three different dosage FSME IMMUN NEW course Baxter study 205 They and/or legal guardian understand nature study , agree provision give write informed consent There specific exclusion criterion study entry . However volunteer assess eligibility receive third vaccination . Volunteers exclude vaccination consecutive visit study : Are clinically healthy , ( i. e. physician would reservations vaccinate FSME IMMUN NEW outside scope clinical trial ) Have already administer third TBE vaccination elsewhere two vaccination Baxter study 205 Have allergic reaction one component vaccine since last vaccination Baxter study 205 Suffer disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment ( e.g . systemic corticosteroid , chemotherapeutics ) expect influence immunological function Have receive banked human blood immunoglobulin within one month study entry Are know HIV positive ( special HIV test require purpose study ) since last visit Baxter study 205 Have vaccination yellow fever / Japanese Bencephalitis since last visit Baxter study 205 Had receive investigational new drug within 6 week prior study start If female capable bearing child positive pregnancy test first medical examination
